description: This Java class defines a data transfer object (DTO) for starting a conversation in the intelligent chatbot service. It includes fields for passenger ID, language code, and communication channel, with validation constraints on the language code.

classes.name: StartConversationRequest
classes.description: DTO representing a request to initiate a conversation, including passenger identification and language/channel preferences.

methods.name: getPassengerId
methods.description: Retrieves the UUID of the passenger.

methods.name: setPassengerId
methods.description: Sets the UUID of the passenger.

methods.name: getLanguageCode
methods.description: Retrieves the language code for the conversation.

methods.name: setLanguageCode
methods.description: Sets the language code, validated to match a pattern like 'en' or 'en-IN'.

methods.name: setChannel
methods.description: Sets the communication channel type, defaulting to 'text'.
